articles.description:
RT Stef(🧱,🚀)
Excited to get into this video!  I definitely want to get more experience with @radicle and the problem it solves is necessary.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Censorship-resistant Git hosting with @radicle 🌱
by @dabit3 
How to use Radicle - both the Radicle CLI as well as the network - to host your app source code on a decentralized network instead of relying on a centralized service like GitHub or Bitbucket
 https://youtu.be/MhoRiH2podI
